title: Change server
body: I would like to change my ID from NA to KR, but there is no KR server that I can change server. Please tell me the way to change my ID to KR server. Thanks.

replies.body: Sadly we can't transfer an account to the KR server. This is partly due to the fact that you need to be a Korean resident to play on their servers. If you do currently reside in that region, you should be able to create a new account there.
